Silly to Serious Projects

2018

2017

  • Jun 01 Code : Trawler — A data gathering framework to search and get information from web sources

  • Apr 25 Code : Compute Client — A web based compute client for tracking the scientific research activity

  • Jan 20 Code : Django Elasticemail — sending emails with Elasticemail as service

2016

  • Nov 29 Code : Rsquare Molecular Viewer — A library to create bio-molecular viewer widgets for developers

  • Jul 01 Code : r2 console — Command line utility for monitoring the users' command-line activity.

  • May 16 Code : r2 gromacs.py — Automation script for a molecular dynamics tool - Gromacs (www.gromacs.org).

  • May 02 Code : Lucy Chatbot — A chatbot that is designed to become a scientist's personal research assistant

2015

  • Dec 20 Code : Django Seed — Seed project for Django + MongoDB + Redis + Celery

  • Dec 12 Code : Whatsapp chatmate — Chatmate project the reads what for Django + MongoDB

2014

  • Dec 22 Code : r2 Gromacs GUI — GUI tool for a molecular dynamics tool - Gromacs (www.gromacs.org).
